text: 2.9 Apo 20.34, 1 Ko 4.12, 2 Ko 11.9, 12.15 Mam sɨkop, nɨbi nepɨm, chɨn nɨb ayɨp mɨdɨl, koslam yɨbɨl golɨgɨpun. Nɨbop anɨb agɨnok, Chɨn mɨŋel nɨbop ma ñɨnɨgabun, tap tɨtay okok chɨnop ma ñɨnɨmɨb agɨnok. Anɨb ak pen chɨn wog kɨles tɨmel gɨl, subnab abe maynab abe golɨgɨpun ak pen, God takaw teplep ak abe agñolɨgɨpun.
